name: Verify PUT request successfully updates chatbot details -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends PUT request to update chatbot details with chatbot_name "New updated Name", chatbot_description "Updated through Automation suite", and env_id "f0b53f20-5ebe-4132-cbea-68725ef2c5c8"
When the user receives the response
Then the status code returned should be 200 for a successful request
And the response should contain the chatbot_id
And the status should be In_progress

fullName: Update Chatbot API: Verify PUT request successfully updates chatbot details
